name: Connell Curtis Group
overview:
Connell Curtis Group, LLC quietly provides high quality management & technology consulting services.

Connell Curtis Group (CCG) provides a full suite of management and technology solutions to help people and companies explore extraordinary opportunities, manage and sustain growth, and maximize revenue.

Our clients talk to us when they find themselves under pressure to deliver results. They call us in uncertain times. They talk to us when information is difficult to get and insights are scarce. They call us when they need to make decisions that will have major consequences for their people, their organizations, and the regions in which they operate. They call us when they want a truly fresh perspective.

The Connell Curtis Group has the experience and capacity to significantly enhance current sales, marketing and customer operations while reducing operational costs. The end result is value creation through a significantly stronger organization built for long term success.
